text.section: The trial may not be held until after the birth of the child who is the subject of the proceeding.

If a complaint is filed before the birth of the child, then, until the trial is held, the court may:
order the alleged father or the pregnant woman to give bond, as provided in § 5-1014 of this subtitle, conditioned on the party:
appearing in the proceeding; and
complying with any further orders of the court;
increase or decrease any bond previously given by the alleged father or the pregnant woman; and
conduct any other preliminary proceeding that the court considers just and proper.
